quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be a great idea if you could venture south. After that, attempt to venture east. Then, make an attempt to go to the south. If you can succeed at that, venture south. With that done, head west. Once you succeed at that, try to go west. After that, venture south. After that, make an effort to take a trip west. With that over with, pick up the fondue from the floor of the kitchenette. Then, eat the fondue. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchenette. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a case. Is this it? Is this what you came to TextWorld to see? a case?[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The case contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The case is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You've entered a pantry. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You scan the room, seeing a workbench. [if there is something on the s_0]On the workbench you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Ah, the shower. This is some kind of shower, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a garage. A typical kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so usual all of a sudden, it's because you've just shown up in the playroom. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] coffer in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. It seems to be pretty normal here.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a chair. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the chair.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've entered a studio. You start to take note of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a typical kind of place. That is to say, you're in a bedroom.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. A typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can see a mantle. You wonder idly who left that here. The mantle is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the mantle you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] However, the mantle, like an empty mantle, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a dish-pit. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see a shelf. What a coincidence, weren't you just thinking about a shelf? The shelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_3] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a spare room. An ordinary one. You begin to take stock of what's here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a cubicle.

 You make out a cabinet. There's something about an object in a room that's just so... TextWorld.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is typical.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bookshelf you see [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in a place we're calling a cookhouse.

 You make out a fridge. Now why would someone leave that there?[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_4], so there's that.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a study. An ordinary kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You can see a toolbox. A toolbox... Is that really what you were looking for?[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The toolbox is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 5 locker, which looks ordinary, in the room.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The type 5 locker contains [a list of things in the c_6]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The type 5 locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] portmanteau close by.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a desk. The desk is usual.[if there is something on the s_5] On the desk you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a parlor. A typical one.

 Hey, want to see a mantelpiece? Look over there, a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_6]On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_6]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if] You see a bed. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the bed.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bar. An ordinary kind of place.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a dresser. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_8]. A dresser... Is that really what you were looking for?[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a couch. The couch is normal.[if there is something on the s_8] On the couch you make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the couch.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You arrive in a scullery. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a plate. The plate is normal.[if there is something on the s_10] On the plate you can see [a list of things on the s_10]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a rack. The rack is typical.[if there is something on the s_9] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_9]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] The rack appears to be empty. Hopefully, this discovery doesn't ruin your TextWorld experience![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a sauna. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can see a table. The table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_11] On the table you can make out [a list of things on the s_11]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen.

 You can see a freezer.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] What a letdown! The freezer is empty![end if] You make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fudge scented chest right there by you.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The fudge scented chest contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The fudge scented chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You're now in the salon.

 Look over there! a basket.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_11]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The basket is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You see a stand. [if there is something on the s_12]You see [a list of things on the s_12] on the stand. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_12]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. This always happens, here in TextWorld![end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: The gate looks sturdy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: coffer
infos.desc: The coffer looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The freezer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The basket looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The fridge looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The type 5 locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The portmanteau looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The fudge scented chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: fondue
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

infos.name: loaf of bread
infos.desc: that's an ordinary loaf of bread!

infos.name: peanut
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: The stick of butter looks delectable.

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The metal of the key is satin.

infos.name: mouse
infos.desc: The mouse is cheap looking.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is balanced.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is unstable.

infos.name: plate
infos.desc: The plate is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is shaky.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is unstable.

infos.name: mantle
infos.desc: The mantle is undependable.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is solid.

infos.name: bookshelf
infos.desc: The bookshelf is an unstable piece of garbage.

infos.name: desk
infos.desc: The desk is undependable.

infos.name: mantelpiece
infos.desc: The mantelpiece is solidly built.

infos.name: bed
infos.desc: The bed is shaky.

infos.name: couch
infos.desc: The couch is wobbly.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is shaky.

infos.name: type 5 key
infos.desc: The metal of the type 5 key is polished.

infos.name: fudge scented key
infos.desc: The fudge scented key is cold to the touch

infos.name: stapler
infos.desc: The stapler appears out of place here

infos.name: textbook
infos.desc: The textbook is well-used.

infos.name: controller
infos.desc: The controller is clean.

infos.name: glass
infos.desc: The glass is antiquated.

infos.name: binder
infos.desc: The binder would seem to be to fit in here

infos.name: monitor
infos.desc: The monitor appears to fit in here

infos.name: bug
infos.desc: The bug is unremarkable.

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, go to the south. After that, attempt to venture east. And then, try to travel south. With that accomplished, take a trip south. Then, make an attempt to go to the west. Okay, and then, move west. And then, try to go south. Then, take a trip west. After that, recover the fondue from the floor of the kitchenette. Then, eat the fondue. Alright, thanks!
